output_list.code: function transfer(address _to, uint256 _value) realUser(_to) moreThanZero(_value) public returns (bool) {
output_list.reason: The function transfer() is vulnerable to randomness attack. The function will transfer tokens to a random address instead of the intended recipient. The randomness can be exploited by miners to manipulate the outcome of the transfer. The function should use a pseudo-random number generator instead of blockhash and timestamp.
